title: Spirit of the Renaissance
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explores the intellectual and artistic climate of Florence during the fourteenth and fifteenth centuries using scenes from the daily life of a contemporary Florentine. Discusses the lives and influence of Petrarca, Alberti, Leonardo Da Vinci and Savonarola. Film uses dramatization, contemporary art material with modern day footage of Florence and Rome.
